text: Avdankasy () is a rural locality (a village) in Shatmaposinskoye Rural Settlement of Morgaushsky District, Chuvashia, Russia. The population was 180 as of 2012.Численность населения районов Чувашской Республики There are 5 streets. == Geography == The village is located 43 km from Cheboksary. == References == Category:Rural localities in Chuvashia
title: Avdankasy
